reviewText: Very watchable - correct balance of talking vs dancing. Nice balance of explanation of footwork vs overall form. Very pleased with the amount of content. What a set!
DVD is fine whether I'm looking for Latin Hustle.

The Best hustle instruction ever. This is the "REAL DEAL" ......love it love it love it!!!!!!!!!!

Thank you
Excellent video, professionally done; carefully describes dance figures and great style.

Billy and Katie are World Champions for a good reason...They are awesome! This video series is carefully presented. They explain everything in detail without becoming boring. They obviously know their "stuff" and enjoy teaching it. Yes, you can learn to hustle properly and to a high degree of proficency with these videos. Listen, watch and practice... over and over until you have it down pat! This video set goes from basis to advanced and can result in receiving plenty of compliments on the dance floor. It did for my partner and I!
